short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate how long a task will take using PERT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link task estimates directly to your ticketing system for easy reference or generate text summaries, allowing you to share or paste them into any document.

PERT, or Program Evaluation and Review Technique, is a methodology utilized for analyzing and estimating project timelines accurately. It incorporates probability and statistical analysis to deliver more precise estimates. It utilizes a weighted average of three time estimates: optimistic (O), most likely (M), and pessimistic (P). 

Elevate your project management efforts with the PERT Calculator extension.
